name: Golden Nugget

reviews.text: We stayed here after finding a great deal at hotels.com. We tried to check in at 2:30, we were told our room was dirty and to come back at 4pm. We returned at 4pm and we were told the room was still dirty. I told them we had a 5pm dinner reservation and asked if there was anything they could do. They gave us a double bed room instead of the king we wanted. We had no choice. He wasn't sure how long we would have to wait for a king... And being it was already 4:05- time was right. Don't assume that you will get your room at 4pm when it's check in time. We weren't the only ones who were told this either. For the price it was a good deal ($54)...
reviews.title: Ok stay.... Nothing spectacular

reviews.text: When we stayed the service from everyone was amazing from the front desk at check to the room service and not to mention security was one of the greatest and safest display of force I've seen , they were all very courteous and wanting to please every customer that they encountered just walking on the casino floor I am definitely returning their rooms were all extremely comfortable and home like
reviews.title: WWP shore fun

reviews.text: I recently spent a beautiful Saturday at the Golden Nugget. The waterfront atmosphere was fantastic. The bar/restaurant at the marina was outstanding. The food, drinks, service, and an excellent band were great. What a beautiful place. Before we left we played in the casino and came home as winners! I will definitely be back soon.
reviews.title: Golden Nugget AC perfect waterfront getaway!

reviews.text: This is a nice small place. Room is cozy though not really into the 70s vibe. The windows are small and I can only see the sky so not sure it's worth the extra charge for bay view. Room is nice enough and there is traditional bath tub.
reviews.title: Cozy

reviews.text: The casino floor is not too big and there is plenty to play and good variety of slots.
reviews.title: Recommmend this Hotel for Indonesia Group

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I were pleasantly surprised with the room renovations at The Golden Nugget which were very comfortable with a lounge for reading or watching TV. The pool area includes 4 hot tubs, a swimming pool, and a 5 inch sunning pool with chairs to sit in while keeping cool. There is a bar behind the pool area where 2 awesome fire pits are lit in the evening (There is also music on weekends). We had dinner at the Buffet which displayed a variety of every kind of food. Only desserts were disappointing. The service throughout the hotel was excellent and everything was CLEAN! We will certainly return.
reviews.title: Great Updates!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed two nights with my wife in this hotel. Average per night was 110 USD.
reviews.title: Good hotel, but far from the city

reviews.text: The hotel is glamorous and the rooms are very nice and clean. No complains at all.
reviews.title: Lame frontdesk
Awesome
reviews.text: There are a few restaurant options in the hotel, but we haven't tried any...we just dinned in the city.
Cons:
reviews.title: Great Remodeling Job!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Revolving doors are really small to get you and your luggage in. No one there to help us get our luggage into the hotel.
reviews.title: Nickel and Dime you!

reviews.text: Food at the buffet I rate a 2; Awful stuff - don't do it.
reviews.title: So nice i'm doing it twice!!

reviews.text: Valet cost $5 and took so long to get the car. Other people were also complaining.
reviews.title: Major Upgrade by Landry's for AC Golden Nugget
Booked to arrive and already had bad experience.... hope stay is better.
reviews.text: No service at the bar in the casino. Another couple came and left without a drink as well.

Service charge of $.25 for Black Jack. Never saw that in my life and I have been to numerous casinos around the world! Just open up $5 tables and get rid of the $1-$10 table with the $.25 service charge. I was outta there toot sweet!
reviews.title: Absolutely Wonderful!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Golden Nugget was a beautiful hotel - clean, comfortable rooms and reservation manager (V. Armstrong) was very helpful and accommodating. The elevators for the rooms were next to the check-in desk and a Starbuck's was close by, too...no need to wander through the casino to go to your room or get morning coffee. The casino was spacious and light (not dark like Revel) and not too crowded, making it easy to find a seat at the bar to play video poker (with comp drinks!) All employees were friendly and helpful. This hotel is not on the boardwalk - but that was just fine for me! (There is a hotel Jitney available to take you to the boardwalk) Highly recommend!
reviews.title: Great place stay in AC!

reviews.text: I must say the quality, professionalism and courtesy care was most definitely top notch... All my questions and request were handle expeditiously and with genuine customer care... the staff, service and amenities were absolutely outstanding... I have already recommended GN to my friend and I, without hesitate, most definitely return... I absolutely adored my ritzy stay at the GN...
reviews.title: Wounded Warrior Project Weekend

reviews.text: We came here for my bachelor party and our first stop the bar downstairs at the bar with electronic poker and Jim Bo (James) told us where to go for steaks and even got us reservations at the restaurant. I don't know if is just the place or if it is just by chance but a guy named Daniel was our room service attendant and he was amazing too. Gave us the details in where to go and what to do in the city. By service alone I will come back!
reviews.title: Hotel was great but service was amazing

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Golden Nuggent provide me and wife a wonderful time while we were there for our weekend stay there. The Boat Show and food service was excellent along with clean rooms. The gambling was fun, and the service was great on the gambling floor. The people that I and my wife encounter while at the golden nuggent were nice and very professional and I cant wait to do it again next year with the Wound Warrior Project. Again a special thank you to Donna and the Golden Nugget for putting on such a special event for us Wounded Warriors!!! Lets not forget Tony from the Wounded Warrior Project that helps puts this all together for us wounded Warriors!! Thank you all!!
reviews.title: Excellent

reviews.text: me and my wife had a great time at the boat show food was great service excellent clean rooms and of course great gambling which of course you never win but the service was great and the people so nice cant wait to do it again next years boat race with team gieco
reviews.title: great

description: The Golden Nugget Atlantic City, winner of the AAA Four Diamond award, is a premier resort destination located on the Frank S. Farley Marina and offers guests 727 beautifully remodeled rooms and suites. The entire property has just completed a $150 million renovation, taking on a fresh, modern look to include a high-energy casino featuring the most popular slot and video poker machines, table games, and poker room; nightly entertainment, new bars and lounges, stylish retail offerings, as well as Landry’s signature world-class restaurants such as Chart House and Vic & Anthony’s Steakhouse; a luxury spa and salon; and H20 poolside lounge. New owners, Landry’s,Inc, have introduced first-class accommodations, exquisite dining options and fun-filled entertainment venues unlike anything else available in Atlantic City. The Golden Nugget has already established strong brand recognitionworldwide with locations in both Las Vegas and Laughlin, NV.
